translation.en: True!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True! ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
-[laughing] -Hi, Mom.
Neverending Rainbow Day has started!
I wish it really was neverending!
Could you imagine a full-time rainbow carnival?
translation.zh:
‎你能想象彩虹嘉年华
‎一直持续不停吗？

translation.en: I think it means the rainbow is neverending, Bartleby, not the day.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得意思其实是
‎彩虹永无止境 小黑 ‎而不是这一天

translation.en: Hmm... where do we start, B?
Easy. Breakfast!
[mumbling] Pancakes. Yummy-yummy.
Mmm! Blue, green, yellow, red...
Yup, they're all here.
[True] Bartleby, look! It's happening.
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day!
translation.zh:
‎-永无止境彩虹日快乐
‎-永无止境彩虹日快乐

translation.en: OK, what's next?
Let's try Rainbow Yeti Spaghetti.
translation.zh: ‎我们来试试雪人做的意大利面

translation.en: How about the Rainbow Roller?
May I suggest a visit to Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight?
translation.zh: ‎我能建议你们去看看 ‎迪哩达哩的眼花缭乱欢乐小人国吗？

translation.en: -[True and Bartleby] Rainbow King! -[strums chord]
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day, your majesty.
translation.zh: ‎永无止境彩虹日快乐 陛下

translation.en: And to you too, True and Bartleby.
So what's this dilly with the dazzly doodads...?
translation.zh: ‎所以 这个噼里啪啦迪哩哇啦是啥？

translation.en: [chuckles] Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight!
translation.zh: ‎迪哩达哩的眼花缭乱欢乐小人国

translation.en: It's full of the most wonderful treasures from all across the Kingdom.
translation.zh: ‎充满了全王国各地最奇妙的宝藏

translation.en: Like this zookalele.
My good friend Dillydally gave it to me.
translation.zh: ‎是我的好友迪哩达哩给送我的

translation.en: You know Dillydally, the Great Explorer?
translation.zh: ‎你认识迪哩达哩？ ‎那位伟大的探险家？

translation.en: Indeed I do.
She is one of my dearest friends. And we both love music,
translation.zh:
‎她是我最亲密的朋友之一
‎我们都喜欢音乐

translation.en: so she always brings me back a musical souvenir from her travels.
translation.zh:
‎所以她在旅行时
‎总是为我带回音乐纪念品

translation.en: Can we meet her?
[laughs] Oh, goodness, no.
Dillydally went on an adventure to find a magical instrument
translation.zh:
‎迪哩达哩去年出发
‎去永无止境彩虹的尽头

translation.en: at the end of the Neverending Rainbow last year.
She's been gone a whole year? No wonder they call her Dillydally.
translation.zh:
‎她都走了一整年了？
‎难怪大家叫她迪哩达哩

translation.en: Come to think of it, that is an awfully long time, even for Dillydally.
translation.zh: ‎仔细想想 这的确是很长时间了 ‎哪怕是对迪哩达哩而言

translation.en: I fear she may be... missing.
[both] Missing!
We have to go find her.
Jumping juniper! It's far too dangerous, True.
translation.zh: ‎噢 我的天啊 ‎太危险了 小真

translation.en: Anyone who crosses the Neverending Rainbow
translation.zh: ‎任何跨过永无止境彩虹的人

translation.en: must be prepared to face anything,
translation.zh: ‎都必须要做好面对一切的准备

translation.en: and come back before sunset.
If anyone can find Dillydally and bring her back, it's me and Bartleby.
translation.zh: ‎如果有人能找到并带回迪哩达哩 ‎那肯定是我和小黑

translation.en: Very well.
But remember... at sunset the Neverending Rainbow will vanish for another year.
translation.zh:
‎非常好 但要记住 ‎到日落时 永无止境彩虹就会
‎再次消失一整年

translation.en: We'll move Kittynatti fast! Right, True?
translation.zh:
‎我们会拿出忍者猫的速度
‎对吧 小真？

translation.en: First things first, we need some Wish help!
translation.zh:
‎事情有先后
‎我们需要一些心愿使者的帮助

translation.en: Oh, Cumulo!
Thanks, Cumulo.
We'll get you back to the carnival in time for the next ride.
translation.zh:
‎在下一趟搭乘之前
‎我们会让你回到嘉年华的

translation.en: [True] To the Wishing Tree, please.
OK, Wishes. From the top...
translation.zh: ‎好的 心愿使者 从头开始

translation.en: [gasps] Musical Wishes!
True, Bartleby! You like jazz?
translation.zh: ‎小真 小黑 你们喜欢爵士乐吗？

translation.en: Listen to this!
We'd love to, Zee, but we're in a real hurry.
translation.zh: ‎我们很愿意 齐克 但我们很赶时间

translation.en: Yeah! We're going over the Neverending Rainbow.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我们要跨过永无止境彩虹

translation.en: To find Dillydally.
The Great Explorer? As I remember, she never came back from her last expedition.
translation.zh: ‎伟大的探险家 ‎我记得 她上次出发探险后还没回来

translation.en: Right. So we're heading over the Rainbow to find her.
translation.zh: ‎对 所以我们要去彩虹那边找她

translation.en: That means you will have to come back by the end of the day.
translation.zh: ‎这就意味着 你们得要在天黑前回来

translation.en: What if you get stuck on the other side too?
translation.zh: ‎要是你们也被困在另一边咋办啊？

translation.en: We do have to hurry, Zee, but we'll be just fine,
translation.zh:
‎我们得要赶紧 齐克 ‎但只要有正确的心愿使者的帮助
‎我们就会没事的

translation.en: as long as we have the right Wish help.
translation.zh:
‎但只要有正确的心愿使者的帮助
‎我们就会没事的

translation.en: Absolutely!
Let's sit... and have a think.
translation.zh: ‎绝对的 我们坐下来 ‎想一想

translation.en: OK True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.zh: ‎好的 小真 ‎你想让心愿树如何帮助你呢？

translation.en: Well, maybe Dillydally didn't come back
translation.zh: ‎迪哩达哩没有回来 可能是被困住了

translation.en: because she's trapped or needs some kind of help...
translation.zh: ‎迪哩达哩没有回来 可能是被困住了 ‎或是需要某种帮助

translation.en: We have to be prepared for anything.
Right, we don't know what you might find over the Rainbow.
translation.zh:
‎对 我们不知道
‎你会在彩虹那边遇到什么

translation.en: We might not know, but the Wishing Tree always shares the right Wishes.
translation.zh: ‎我们或许不知道 ‎但心愿树总是能选对心愿使者

translation.en: Then it's up to me to figure out how to use them.
translation.zh: ‎然后就轮到我来搞清楚如何使用

translation.en: You always do, True.
The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
translation.zh: ‎心愿树已经听到了你的心愿 小真

translation.en: It is time to get your three Wishes.
translation.zh: ‎是时候领取你的三个心愿使者了

translation.en: I'm ready!
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree,
please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ Boo-ster!
translation.zh:
‎-你的心愿 一 二 三
‎-Boo-ster

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Whompit!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
Korokoro!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an exciting ensemble of Wishes!
translation.zh: ‎多么令人兴奋的心愿使者组合啊

translation.en: Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.zh:
‎我们看看关于他们的能力
‎心愿百科上是怎么说的

translation.en: This is Boo-ster.
Boo-ster!
This one will really blow you away.
[Zee] Boo-ster can take a big breath and blow out a super-powerful jet of air.
translation.zh: ‎Boo-ster可以深吸一口气 ‎然后喷出超强力的气流

translation.en: I can't wait to see you in action, Boo-ster.
Who do we have next?
Oh yes, this is Whompit.
Whompit!
[Zee] As you know, Whompit is a stomping Wish
translation.zh: ‎如你所知 Whompit是个跺脚心愿使者

translation.en: that just loves to stomp and smash the ground.
Nice to see you again, Whompit. I don't know when we'll need your help,
translation.zh:
‎很高兴又见到你 Whompit
‎我不知道啥时候才需要你的帮助

translation.en: but I'm sure we'll have a smashing good time!
translation.zh: ‎但我知道我们会跺得很开心的

translation.en: Whompit!
And finally, we have Korokoro.
-Korokoro. -A super rare Wish.
[Zee] Korokoro has grippy powers.
It can help you walk on really slippery surfaces.
translation.zh: ‎能帮你在非常滑溜的表面上行走

translation.en: Amazing! I'm glad to have you with us, Korokoro.
translation.zh: ‎好神奇 ‎真高兴有你陪我们一起去 Korokoro

translation.en: Korokoro!
Are you three ready for an adventure on the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.zh:
‎你们三位准备好
‎去永无止境彩虹冒险了吗？

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.zh: ‎红黄蓝 心愿使者进背包

translation.en: Thanks, Zee. We'll be back soon.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 齐克 我们很快就会回来的

translation.en: I'm counting on it.
Thanks, Cumulo! You should get back to the Carnival. We can walk from here.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 小白云 ‎你该回嘉年华去了 我们可以自己走

translation.en: Yeah, it'll be nice to stretch our legs a bit...
translation.zh: ‎是的 能活动一下腿脚也不错

translation.en: Besides, how long could it take to cross the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.zh:
‎另外 跨过永无止境彩虹
‎得花多长时间？

translation.en: [Bartleby] Skyblubbs? We must be really high up.
translation.zh: ‎飞天泡泡？ ‎我们肯定非常高了

translation.en: [pants] When are we going to get to the end of this neverending rainbow?
translation.zh:
‎这个永无止境彩虹
‎什么时候才走得完啊？

translation.en: I can't believe Dillydally came all this way by herself.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信迪哩达哩
‎一个人走了这么远

translation.en: I wonder what she was hoping to find.
I'm hoping to find the world's biggest zazoony juice.
translation.zh: ‎我希望能找到世界上最大的沙酸汁

translation.en: Mmm... super frosty with lots of ice cubes and-- A fork!
translation.zh:
‎-超冰凉 超多冰块 还要…
‎-叉

translation.en: Um, I think a straw might work better for zazoony juice, True.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得用吸管喝沙酸汁
‎比较合适 小真

translation.en: No, it's a fork in the rainbow. Look!
translation.zh: ‎不 ‎我是说彩虹分叉了 瞧

translation.en: -Huh? -Which way should we go?
I've got this, True.
My tail always knows which way to go...
translation.zh: ‎我的尾巴总是知道该走哪边

translation.en: That-a-way!
Why did your tail pick that path?
Easy. That other path has stairs.
Good call, tail. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎选得不错 尾巴 我们走吧

translation.en: Well, it's nothing but smooth sailing from here on out.
Right, True?
Uh-oh. What do you mean, "uh-oh"?
Oh, dear.
It's like walking a tightrope.
We just need to walk slow and steady.
-I got you, True! -Phew! Thanks.
This is trickier than I thought...
Ha! Not for a red-tabby Kittynatti.
Watch me, OK? And then just do what I do.
translation.zh: ‎看着我 好吗？然后学着我

translation.en: See True? Easy peasy, rainbow squeezy!
translation.zh: ‎看到没 小真？轻松加愉快

translation.en: Hang on, B!
-I gotcha! -Phew.
You OK, Bartleby?
I am now. But I don't think I could have held myself up much longer.
translation.zh:
‎现在还好
‎但我觉得我应该撑不了多久

translation.en: [Bartleby] Whoa! We're high!
This could work if we do it together.
translation.zh: ‎这可能有用 ‎如果我们齐心协力

translation.en: I'll hold you up, and you hold me up, OK?
translation.zh: ‎我撑住你 ‎你也撑住我 好吗？

translation.en: OK, you got it.
Steady...
Easy...
-OK, come on. -OK.
You can do it, True! Just don't look down!
translation.zh:
‎你可以的 小真 别往下看
‎因为我们非常高

translation.en: 'Cause we're up so high, and you don't want to get dizzy.
translation.zh:
‎你可以的 小真 别往下看
‎因为我们非常高 ‎你可不想要头晕

translation.en: You don't even want to think about falling 'cause it'll be like...
translation.zh: ‎至于摔下去 连想都别想 因为那会…

translation.en: [splat] Oh, I can't look!
-Done. -What?
We're here. We made it.
We did it! Go Teamwork, right?
translation.zh: ‎我们成功了 团队合作 对吧？

translation.en: Thanks, B. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 小黑 没有你可不行

translation.en: And look, we're almost at the top of the Rainbow.
translation.zh:
‎瞧啊 ‎-我们马上就要到彩虹顶部了
‎-是的

translation.en: Yeah, we can handle anything this wacky Rainbow can throw at us.
translation.zh:
‎我们能应付这古怪彩虹
‎带来的任何麻烦

translation.en: And I spoke too soon.
[gasps] Come on, we'd better be quick if we're going to beat that storm.
translation.zh: ‎快点 ‎如果想要躲过风暴 我们最好抓紧点

translation.en: -[cloud grunts] -[True] Excuse me. Hi!
We really need to get to the other side of the rainbow.
translation.zh: ‎我们真的需要赶到彩虹另一头去

translation.en: Could you please let us through?
Aw, you're stuck and you're too full of rain to move?
translation.zh: ‎你被卡住了 雨水太多 没法移动？

translation.en: What do we do, True?
We can't just stroll through a lightening cloud.
One wrong move and...
Not if we use some Wish power to blow it away.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们用心愿使者的能力
‎吹走它就不会了

translation.en: Time for my first Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Boo-ster, Wish come true!
Hi, Boo-ster. See that big storm cloud over there?
translation.zh:
‎嗨 Boo-ster
‎看到那一大片雷雨云了吗？

translation.en: It's stuck on the rainbow and it needs our help.
translation.zh:
‎它被卡在彩虹上了
‎它需要我们的帮助

translation.en: Let's give it a push with your super strong wind!
translation.zh: ‎让我们用你的超强风来推它一把

translation.en: OK, Boo-ster... Blow, blow...
blow!
-Look, it's-- -Ticklish.
One more time, Boo-ster.
-You're welcome. -Thanks for not zapping us.
Great job, Boo-ster! Now back in the pack!
translation.zh: ‎干得漂亮 Boo-ster ‎回到背包里去吧

translation.en: Whoa! Be careful, B. It's a little slippery...
Uh, True?
I know this is fun and all...
[yelling] but we don't have any brakes!
Prepare for a crash landing!
We made it, B! This is the end of the Rainbow.
translation.zh: ‎我们成功了 小黑 这是彩虹的尽头

translation.en: Dillydally must be somewhere on this island!
translation.zh: ‎迪哩达哩肯定就在这岛上的什么地方

translation.en: -Hello! -Dillydally! Are you here?
-[distant tapping] -[gasps]
Listen. Do you hear a "tink-tink-tink"?
translation.zh: ‎快听 你听到丁当声了吗？

translation.en: You must have cat ears, True.
translation.zh: ‎你这肯定是猫耳朵啊 小真

translation.en: I tink-tink-tink the tink-tink-tink is coming from over there!
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这丁当声是从那边传来的

translation.en: -[louder tapping] -[gasps] Bartleby, look!
It's her... Dillydally!
Huh? What?
Oh my! Are you two lost?
No, we're here to find you!
I'm True, and this is Bartleby.
We're friends of the Rainbow King.
Bouncing bongos!
Any friend of the Rainbow King is a friend of mine.
translation.zh: ‎彩虹王的朋友也就是我的朋友

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the rainbow's end ♪
♪ I'm tickled pink to see you, friends ♪
translation.zh: ‎真高兴见到你们 朋友们

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.zh: ‎睁大蓝眼睛 张开紫耳朵

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
Oh, dear.
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪
♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
♪ Could use a stick un-stucker tool ♪ ♪ To help un-stuck that fuchsia jewel ♪
translation.zh:
‎用得到松动工具
‎来撬松这紫红色的宝石

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
No!
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.zh:
‎哎呀呀 出问题了
‎我需要这调子不跑调

translation.en: ♪ I tink tink tink and tonk tonk tonk ♪
♪ But no tink tonk will move that rock ♪
♪ It's my Dillydally kazoofa-flute And all it needs now is a... ♪
translation.zh:
‎这是我的迪哩达哩卡祖笛
‎现在我只需要…

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -Bravo! That was so fun.
Rainbow King would've loved that song.
translation.zh: ‎彩虹王肯定会喜欢这首歌的

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King... I miss him ever so dearly.
translation.zh: ‎噢 彩虹王 ‎我真是非常想念他

translation.en: I haven't seen him for a whole year.
I could never be away from True that long.
translation.zh: ‎我永远无法离开小真这么久

translation.en: But you're in luck!
Because he sent us to find you and help get you home.
translation.zh: ‎因为他派我们来找你 帮你回家

translation.en: Don't be a silly slide whistle!
I'm not lost. I chose to stay here.
translation.zh: ‎我没迷路 我选择留在这里

translation.en: I was collecting these magical crystals
translation.zh: ‎我在搜集这些魔法水晶制作卡祖笛

translation.en: to make a kazoofa-flute as a souvenir for Rainbow King.
translation.zh: ‎我在搜集这些魔法水晶制作卡祖笛 ‎给彩虹王准备的纪念品

translation.en: But the very last crystal just won't budge so I'm missing a note.
translation.zh: ‎但这最后的水晶就是挪不动 ‎所以我还缺少一个音符

translation.en: And I am not leaving without it.
What kind of a friend would I be
if I brought home a half-finished souvenir?
translation.zh: ‎是个半成品 那我成什么朋友了？

translation.en: I do not think she's coming with us any time soon. Nuh-uh.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得她不会很快就跟我们走的

translation.en: We came here to rescue Dillydally, and we're not going home without her.
translation.zh: ‎我们来这里是为了救援迪哩达哩 ‎不带上她 我们绝不离开

translation.en: Uh, well we'd better hurry, True.
translation.zh: ‎那我们最好赶紧点 小真

translation.en: The sun's gonna set soon
and you, me and Dillydally will be stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.zh:
‎你 我 还有迪哩达哩会被困在这里
‎直到下一个永无止境彩虹日

translation.en: OK, if Dillydally won't leave without the last crystal,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 如果迪哩达哩拿不到
‎最后的水晶就不离开的话

translation.en: maybe we can help get it out. Time for my second Wish!
translation.zh: ‎没准我们可以帮她拿到 ‎该用第二个心愿了

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Whompit!
-Whompit! -Wish come true!
Hi, Whompit!
We need your whompin', stompin' power to shake a crystal loose.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要你猛烈的跺脚能力
‎来把水晶抖松

translation.en: Whomp, whomp!
OK everybody, watch out!
-[loud thud] -[gasps] Clapping castanets! What was that?
Whompit's going to help you get that crystal out.
You might wanna stay off the ground for a little bit.
Hop on!
Alright, Whompit.
Let's stomp, stomp, stomp it!
Almost!
Way to stomp it, Whompit!
Now back in the pack!
Whomp, whomp!
Wow! It made the rainbow glow.
That's the power of the Rainbow Crystals!
Isn't this is the perfect souvenir for Rainbow King?
translation.zh:
‎这就是送给彩虹王的
‎完美纪念品 对吧？

translation.en: He's going to love it, Dillydally.
translation.zh: ‎他会很喜欢的 迪哩达哩

translation.en: And we're going to give it to him today, right?
translation.zh: ‎我们今天就要交给他 对吧？

translation.en: As in before the sun goes down?
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 在太阳下山前

translation.en: [gasps] We might be too late!
[Dillydally] Without the sun, there will be no rainbow to take us home!
translation.zh:
‎没有太阳
‎也就没有彩虹带我们回家了

translation.en: [gasps] Come on! Let's get moving.
It's way too steep.
Not for my super Kittynati rainbow grip!
Remind me to sharpen my claws next time.
translation.zh: ‎下次记得提醒我先把爪子削尖

translation.en: Is there another way off this island, Dillydally?
translation.zh:
‎还有其他路可以离开这个岛吗？
‎迪哩达哩

translation.en: I was going to figure that part out after I got the crystal.
translation.zh:
‎我原本准备在拿到水晶之后
‎再去研究这个的

translation.en: So we're stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day?
translation.zh:
‎所以我们得被困在这里
‎直到下一个永无止境彩虹日？

translation.en: Look on the bright side. We finished the kazoofa-flute!
translation.zh: ‎往好处想想 ‎我们完成了卡祖笛

translation.en: [Bartleby] What? I didn't even bring any Fishy Poof Crackers!
translation.zh: ‎什么？我都没有带鱼肉夹心饼干

translation.en: No!
Still so many Fishy Poof flavors to try!
translation.zh: ‎还有好多鱼肉夹心的口味没试过

translation.en: Come now, Bartleby. Get a grip on yourself.
translation.zh: ‎好了 小黑 坚强站起来

translation.en: That's it!
I have just the thing to help us get a grip.
translation.zh: ‎我正好有东西能帮我们站起来

translation.en: It's time for my third Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Korokoro!
Wish come true!
Hi, Korokoro!
We need your help to climb to the top of that super steep rainbow.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要你的帮助
‎才好爬到这个超级陡的彩虹顶上去

translation.en: Korokoro!
Go, Korokoro!
Come on, hop in.
Now, we all need to run as fast as we can.
[True] It's working!
Um, why is the Rainbow flickering?
The sun is setting.
We're running out of time!
Faster, everyone, faster!
translation.zh: ‎快一点 各位 快一点

translation.en: Whoo-hoo! We made it to the top of the Rainbow! No more climbing!
translation.zh: ‎我们到彩虹顶上了 ‎不用再爬了

translation.en: It's all downhill from here!
[Dillydally] I can see Rainbow City.
[Bartleby yells] The rainbow is fading!
We're not gonna make it!
Dillydally! Your kazoofa-flute.
Can you play it to keep the rainbow glowing?
translation.zh: ‎你能吹奏起来 好让彩虹发光吗？

translation.en: You betcha!
[Rainbow King] I should never have let them go over the Rainbow...
translation.zh: ‎我就不该让他们跨过彩虹的

translation.en: Oh, gruesome grey, I miss them so much.
translation.zh: ‎噢 残酷的灰色 我好想他们啊

translation.en: Wait! Could it be... ?
It's too late. The rainbow's gone.
[all] Oh no!
We're not going to make it, I don't think!
Cumulo!
Terrific tambourines! You saved us.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 我的妈呀 ‎你救了我们

translation.en: Of all the cushy, fluffy things I love... you're the best!
translation.zh: ‎在我喜爱的软绵绵毛茸茸的东西里面 ‎你是最棒的

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! I knew I could always count on you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 小白云 ‎我就知道我永远可以依靠你

translation.en: You too, Korokoro.
Korokoro!
-Now back in the pack. -Whoo-hoo!
Grateful green!
Dillydally!
Rainbow King!
I missed you so much.
I was so worried about you, old friend.
I'm sorry I was away so long.
But I just couldn't come home without a special treasure...
translation.zh: ‎不为你带回来一个特别的宝贝

translation.en: for you.
Fantastic fuchsia!
A Kazoofa-flute!
But Dillydally, as wonderful as your souvenirs are,
translation.zh:
‎但是 迪哩达哩
‎虽然你的纪念品很美妙

translation.en: there's no greater treasure than a true friend.
translation.zh: ‎但没什么能比真正的朋友更宝贵

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King, you're so right.
translation.zh: ‎噢 彩虹王 你说得很对

translation.en: And I have two new friends who cared enough to come look for me.
translation.zh: ‎而且我还交到两个新朋友 ‎足够关心我 还来寻找我

translation.en: I'm sorry you missed your Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉让你们错过了永无止境彩虹日

translation.en: Well, not the whole day.
You didn't miss the grand finale.
Rocketing red and booming blue,
a special sight for me and you!
translation.zh: ‎特别的景象 奉献给我和你

translation.en: Here it comes! The best part of Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.zh: ‎来了 永无止境彩虹日最棒的部分

translation.en: Fill the sky with wondrous light,
find a friend and hug them tight!
translation.zh: ‎找到一位朋友 与他紧紧拥抱

translation.en: [Dillydally] ♪ Welcome to the Rainbow's End ♪
♪ I'm tickled pink to see you friend ♪
translation.zh: ‎真高兴见到你们 朋友们

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.zh: ‎睁大蓝眼睛 张开紫耳朵

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow ♪
[Dillydally] Oh.
